task_prompt: 请帮我在维基百科上搜索关于人工智能的简介
send_prompt:
您对 Linux 操作系统非常熟悉。您的任务是操作计算机屏幕，完成指定的任务。
您现在的目标是操作计算机屏幕，视频宽度：1024，视频高度：768，总体目标是 "请帮我在维基百科上搜索关于人工智能的简介"。

我们为这个总体目标制定了一个实施计划：

    1. 双击打开 Microsoft Edge 浏览器

    2. 在地址栏输入 'https://www.wikipedia.org/' 并且按下回车键

    3. 在维基百科的搜索框输入 '人工智能' 并且按下回车键

    4. 从搜索结果中选择关于人工智能的简介页面

    5. 阅读页面内容以获取人工智能的简介


现在的子任务是 "在地址栏输入 'https://www.wikipedia.org/' 并且按下回车键"。
您可以使用鼠标和键盘，可选择的操作有：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```
其中，鼠标的位置是相对于屏幕左上角的坐标，键盘的按键请参考 [keysymdef.h]。

请输出执行动作，请以 json 格式输出您的动作，例如：
我的计划是点击左下角的开始按钮，因此我的操作将是：
```json 
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":10,"height":760}}
]
```

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：
```json
[
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Super_L"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_text":"notepad"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Return"}
]
```


现在的子任务是 "在地址栏输入 'https://www.wikipedia.org/' 并且按下回车键"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response:
在当前屏幕上看到 Microsoft Edge 浏览器已经打开，随后需要在地址栏输入指定的网址。以下是执行这一子任务的详细操作步骤，采用 JSON 格式输出：

```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":400,"height":50}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl_L+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text":"https://www.wikipedia.org/"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Return"}
]
```

首先点击地址栏（我估算大约在屏幕的宽度的 `400` 像素，高度的 `50` 像素处），然后使用键盘快捷键 `Ctrl+A` 选中地址栏中的任何现有文本，接着输入所需的网址 'https://www.wikipedia.org/'，最后按下回车键 `Return` 以访问该网址。
LLM_response_editer:
在当前屏幕上看到 Microsoft Edge 浏览器已经打开，随后需要在地址栏输入指定的网址。以下是执行这一子任务的详细操作步骤，采用 JSON 格式输出：

```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":226,"height":67}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text":"https://www.wikipedia.org/"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Return"}
]
```

首先点击地址栏（我估算大约在屏幕的宽度的 `400` 像素，高度的 `50` 像素处），然后使用键盘快捷键 `Ctrl+A` 选中地址栏中的任何现有文本，接着输入所需的网址 'https://www.wikipedia.org/'，最后按下回车键 `Return` 以访问该网址。
task_prompt_en: Please help me search Wikipedia for an introduction to AI
task_prompt_zh: 请帮我在维基百科上搜索关于人工智能的简介
send_prompt_en:
You are familiar with the Linux operating system. Your task is to operate the computer screen and complete the specified task.
Your current goal is to operate the computer screen. The video width is 1024 and the video height is 768. The overall goal is "please help me search for an introduction to AI on Wikipedia".
We have formulated an implementation plan for this overall goal:
1. Double click to open Microsoft Edge browser
2. Enter 'in the address bar https://www.wikipedia.org/ "And press Enter
3. Enter 'AI' in the Wikipedia search box and press Enter
4. Select the introduction page about AI from the search results
5. Read the page for an introduction to AI
The current subtask is "Enter 'in the address bar https://www.wikipedia.org/ "And press the Enter key".
You can use the mouse and keyboard. The operations you can select are:```json
[
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"double_click","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_up","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"scroll_down","scroll_repeat":int},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"move","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"MouseAction","mouse_action_type":"drag","mouse_button":"left","mouse_position":{"width":int,"height":int}},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"KeyName in keysymdef"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"press","keyboard_key":"Ctrl+A"},
    {"action_type":"KeyboardAction","keyboard_action_type":"text","keyboard_text": "Hello, world!"},
    {"action_type":"WaitAction","wait_time":float}
]
```The position of the mouse is the coordinate relative to the upper left corner of the screen. For keyboard keys, see [keysymdef. h].
Please output the execution action. Please output your action in json format, for example:
My plan is to click the Start button at the bottom left corner, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 10, "height": 760}}
]
```Another example, my plan is to open notepad. I see Mousepad on the screen, so my operation will be:```json
[
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Super_L"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "notepad"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```The current subtask is "Enter 'in the address bar https://www.wikipedia.org/ 'and press the Enter key ", please give the detailed next step according to the status of the existing screen image.

另一个例子，我的计划是打开记事本，我看到屏幕上有Mousepad，因此我的操作将是：

现在的子任务是 "在地址栏输入 'https://www.wikipedia.org/' 并且按下回车键"，请根据现有屏幕图像的状态给出详细的下一步操作。
LLM_response_editer_en:
You can see on the current screen that the Microsoft Edge browser has been opened, and then you need to enter the specified web address in the address bar. The following are the detailed operation steps for executing this subtask, which are output in JSON format:```json
[
    {"action_type": "MouseAction", "mouse_action_type": "click", "mouse_button": "left", "mouse_position": {"width": 226, "height": 67}},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Control_L+a"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "text", "keyboard_text": "https://www.wikipedia.org/"},
    {"action_type": "KeyboardAction", "keyboard_action_type": "press", "keyboard_key": "Return"}
]
```First click the address bar (I estimate that it is about 400 pixels wide and 50 pixels high), then use the keyboard shortcut 'Ctrl+A' to select any existing text in the address bar, and then enter the required web address' https://www.wikipedia.org/ ', and finally press the' Return 'key to access the website.
